column2: an A.M. Eatery////I end up ordering the classic breakfast with sausage links
column3: but they have the full meat spectrum if you're craving something else. I get gravy and onions on my hashbrowns and choose sourdough bread that comes with homemade jelly. This beautiful b**ch brings my hash out with cheese. WITH CHZ. I cried a little. It is now classified as smothered
column5: and country by official Waffle House standards.
